com.soa.auth.credential

Class SSOTokenCredential

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.auth.credential.BinaryTokenCredential
      • com.soa.auth.credential.SSOTokenCredential

  • public class SSOTokenCredential
extends BinaryTokenCredential
    An object to hold the SSO Token name and value when it is contained in the list of credentials within a Subject;
    Since:
    6.0
